label: Sinai Georgian 49, Undertext (Greek minuscule, Greek majuscule)

note: Upright minuscule, hastily executed;  "Auszeichnungsschift" for liturgical rubrics: sloping pointed majuscule
Parchment scroll, with a long writing column

note.value: Reconstructed folio order, ff. 76v, 75r, 63r inner portion, 56v, 52v, 51r, 106v, 109r, 100r, 99v, 74v, 77r inner portion, 50v, 102v, 97r, 96v, 103, 101v, 98r, 110v, 105r, 77v outer portion (here the 'recto' of the roll ends), 77r outer portion (here the 'verso' of the roll starts), 105v, 110r, 98v, 101r, 103v, 96r, 97v, 102r, 50r, 77v inner portion, 74r, 99r, 100v, 109v outer portion, 106r, 51v, 52r, 56r, 63v inner portion, 75v, 76r
Description of undertext by Pasquale Orsini
Bibliography: Bibliograpy: B.-Ch. Mercier, La liturgie de Saint Jacques. édition critique du texte grec avec traduction latine, Patrologia Orientalis, XXVI.2 (Paris, 1946)
